lines.text: Why don't you go down to the grocery store and sit in the dairy section? That way everyone will know YOU are the head cheese!
The Captain of America would not approve!
Stay the fuck away from the girl, or else I'll beat you with my nut sack!
Beer makes you drunk. I drank beer once, with my friend Connie. I fell down and scraped my knee.
Why, sure I do! Dickie, you're my buddy!
NO! I mean... Do you LIKE me?
You're interrupting my reading enjoyment! I'm going elsewhere!
I wanna do it with ya, Connie! I wanna do it with ya BAD!
There's some squirrel and gravy on the counter. Help yourself.
You're the most beautiful girlfriend I've ever had. Actually, you're the only girlfriend I've ever had.
